title: 108: CAST BIO BREAKDOWN: Pilot Pete’s Season
itunes:title: 108: CAST BIO BREAKDOWN: Pilot Pete’s Season
description:
CAST BIOS, Broads! Pilot Pete’s season is about to get started so it’s time to discuss the future women of this season! The Broads go through each of the women and make predictions about how far they will go, potential entrances, possible issues, their dynamic with the other girls, pageant wars, and mostly just Bekah and Jess laughing while creating ridiculous scenarios. Click the link below to follow along as The Broads go through each contestant! 
FOLLOW ALONG HERE: 
https://www.cosmopolitan.com/entertainment/tv/g29087999/peter-weber-bachelor-contestants-season-24-2020/
